_description: Evils of the Time — two monorhyming quatrains

BodRawD893.First Lines: Now pride ys yn prisNow couetyse ys wyse…
BodRawD893.Last Lines:
…Now haþ god euche syn to dystrie þis werle by
                    reson
BodRawD893.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope,
                        ed.  
             Historical Poems of the XIV and XV Centuries.
         New York: Columbia UP, 1959: xliii.
